name: Feature Request
about: Propose a new command, skill, agent, or improvement (committed work)
title: '[FEATURE] '
labels: 'type: feature'
assignees: ''
---

## Feature Summary

A clear and concise description of the feature or improvement.

## Motivation

**What problem does this solve?**

Describe the use case or pain point this addresses.

**Who benefits from this?**
- [ ] Entire team
- [ ] Specific role: ___
- [ ] Specific workflow: ___

## Proposed Solution

**What would you like to see?**

Describe the feature in detail. For configurations:
- **Command:** What should it do? What parameters?
- **Skill:** What workflow does it automate?
- **Agent:** What specialized task does it handle?

## Alternatives Considered

(Optional) What other approaches did you consider? Why is this approach better?

## Implementation Notes

(Optional) If you have ideas about implementation:
- Files that would be affected
- Dependencies needed
- Potential challenges
- Breaking changes or migration needed

## Examples

(Optional) Provide examples of:
- Similar features in other tools
- Code snippets showing usage
- Mock outputs or interfaces

## Type of Feature

- [ ] New command
- [ ] New skill
- [ ] New agent
- [ ] Enhancement to existing config
- [ ] Setup/tooling improvement
- [ ] Documentation
- [ ] Other: ___

## Priority

How important is this to your workflow?
- [ ] Critical - Blocking daily work
- [ ] High - Would significantly improve productivity
- [ ] Medium - Nice to have
- [ ] Low - Minor improvement

## Additional Context

Any other context, screenshots, or references.

**Note:** If you're just exploring an idea without commitment, consider starting a [Discussion](../discussions/new?category=ideas) instead!
